BRK30 &#160; New York Stock Exchange 2.000% Senior Notes due 2034 &#160; BRK34 &#160; New York Stock Exchange Indicate by check mark whether the registrant is an emerging growth company as defined in Rule 405 of the Securities Act of 1933 (&#167;230.405 of this chapter) or Rule 12b-2 of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 (&#167;240.12b-2 of this chapter). Emerging growth company&#160;&#160; &#9744; If an emerging growth company, indicate by check mark if the registrant has elected not to use the extended transition period for complying with any new or revised financial accounting standards provided pursuant to Section&#160;13(a) of the Exchange Act.&#160;&#160;&#9744; &#160; &#160; &#160; Item&#160;8.01 Other Events. On November&#160;29, 2023, Berkshire Hathaway Inc. (&#8220;Berkshire&#8221;) issued (i) &#165;73,400,000,000 aggregate principal amount of its 0.955% Senior Notes due 2026, (ii) &#165;17,100,000,000 aggregate principal amount of its 1.194% Senior Notes due 2028, (iii) &#165;12,300,000,000 aggregate principal amount of its 1.685% Senior Notes due 2033, (iv) &#165;4,000,000,000 aggregate principal amount of its 2.240% Senior Notes due 2043 and (v) &#165;15,200,000,000 aggregate principal amount of its 2.502% Senior Notes due 2058 ((i) through (v)&#160;collectively, the &#8220;Notes&#8221;) under a registration statement on Form S-3 under the Securities Act of 1933, as amended (the &#8220;Securities Act&#8221;), filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission (the &#8220;Commission&#8221;) on January&#160;28, 2022 (Registration No.&#160;333-262384) (the &#8220;Registration Statement&#8221;). The Notes were sold pursuant to an&#160;underwriting agreement&#160;entered into on November&#160;17, 2023, by and among (a)&#160;Berkshire and (b)&#160;Merrill Lynch International and Mizuho Securities USA LLC. The Notes were issued under an Indenture, dated as of January&#160;28, 2022, by and among Berkshire, Berkshire Hathaway Finance Corporation and The Bank of New York Mellon Trust Company, N.A. (the &#8220;Indenture&#8221;) and (i)&#160;an officers&#8217; certificate dated as of November&#160;29, 2023 by Berkshire with respect to its 0.955% Senior Notes due 2026 (the &#8220;2026 Notes Officers&#8217; Certificate&#8221;), (ii) an officers&#8217; certificate dated as of November&#160;29, 2023 by Berkshire with respect to its 1.194% Senior Notes due 2028 (the &#8220;2028 Notes Officers&#8217; Certificate&#8221;), (iii) an officers&#8217; certificate dated as of November&#160;29, 2023 by Berkshire with respect to its 1.685% Senior Notes due 2033 (the &#8220;2033 Notes Officers&#8217; Certificate&#8221;), (iv) an officers&#8217; certificate dated as of November&#160;29, 2023 by Berkshire with respect to its 2.240% Senior Notes due 2043 (the &#8220;2043 Notes Officers&#8217; Certificate&#8221;) and (v)&#160;an officers&#8217; certificate dated as of November&#160;29, 2023 by Berkshire with respect to its 2.502% Senior Notes due 2058 (the &#8220;2058 Notes Officers&#8217; Certificate&#8221;) ((i) through (v)&#160;collectively, the &#8220;Officers&#8217; Certificates&#8221;). The relevant terms of the Notes and the Indenture are further described under the caption &#8220;Description of the Notes&#8221; in the prospectus supplement relating to the Notes, dated November&#160;17, 2023, filed with the Commission by Berkshire on November&#160;20, 2023, pursuant to Rule&#160;424(b)(5) under the Securities Act and in the section entitled &#8220;Description of the Debt Securities&#8221; in the base prospectus relating to debt securities of Berkshire, dated January&#160;28, 2022, included in the Registration Statement, which descriptions are incorporated herein by reference. A copy of the Indenture is set forth in Exhibit 4.1 of the Registration Statement and is incorporated herein by reference. A copy of the 2026 Notes Officers&#8217; Certificate is attached hereto as Exhibit 4.2 and is incorporated herein by reference. A copy of the 2028 Notes Officers&#8217; Certificate is attached hereto as Exhibit 4.3 and is incorporated herein by reference. A copy of the 2033 Notes Officers&#8217; Certificate is attached hereto as Exhibit 4.4 and is incorporated herein by reference. A copy of the 2043 Notes Officers&#8217; Certificate is attached hereto as Exhibit 4.5 and is incorporated herein by reference. A copy of the 2058 Notes Officers&#8217; Certificate is attached hereto as Exhibit 4.6 and is incorporated herein by reference. The descriptions of the Indenture, the Officers&#8217; Certificates and the Notes in this report are summaries and are qualified in their entirety by the terms of the Indenture, the Officers&#8217; Certificates and the Notes, respectively. &#160; Item&#160;9.01 Financial Statements and Exhibits. (d) Exhibits &#160; &#160;&#160;1.1 &#160;&#160; Underwriting Agreement, dated November&#160;17, 2023, by and among (a)&#160;Berkshire Hathaway Inc. and (b)&#160;Merrill Lynch International and Mizuho Securities USA LLC. &#160;&#160;4.1 &#160;&#160; Indenture, dated as of January&#160;28, 2022, by and among Berkshire Hathaway Inc., Berkshire Hathaway Finance Corporation and The Bank of New York Mellon Trust Company, N.A. (incorporated by reference to Exhibit 4.1 of Berkshire Hathaway Inc.&#8217;s Registration Statement on Form S-3 (Registration No.&#160;333-262384) filed with the Commission on January&#160;28, 2022). &#160;&#160;4.2 &#160;&#160; Officers&#8217; Certificate of Berkshire Hathaway Inc., dated as of November&#160;29, 2023, including the form of Berkshire Hathaway&#160;Inc.&#8217;s 0.955% Senior Notes due 2026. &#160; &#160;&#160;4.3 &#160;&#160; Officers&#8217; Certificate of Berkshire Hathaway Inc., dated as of November&#160;29, 2023, including the form of Berkshire Hathaway&#160;Inc.&#8217;s 1.194% Senior Notes due 2028. &#160;&#160;4.4 &#160;&#160; Officers&#8217; Certificate of Berkshire Hathaway Inc., dated as of November&#160;29, 2023, including the form of Berkshire Hathaway Inc.&#8217;s 1.685% Senior Notes due 2033. &#160;&#160;4.5 &#160;&#160; Officers&#8217; Certificate of Berkshire Hathaway Inc., dated as of November&#160;29, 2023, including the form of Berkshire Hathaway Inc.&#8217;s 2.240% Senior Notes due 2043. &#160;&#160;4.6 &#160;&#160; Officers&#8217; Certificate of Berkshire Hathaway Inc., dated as of November&#160;29, 2023, including the form of Berkshire Hathaway Inc.&#8217;s 2.502% Senior Notes due 2058. &#160;&#160;5.1 &#160;&#160; Opinion of Munger, Tolles&#160;&amp; Olson LLP, dated November&#160;29, 2023, with respect to the Notes. 23.1 &#160;&#160; Consent of Munger, Tolles&#160;&amp; Olson LLP (included in Exhibit 5.1). 104 &#160;&#160; Cover Page Interactive Data File (embedded within the Inline XBRL document). &#160; SIGNATURES Pursuant to the requirements of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, the Registrant has duly caused this report to be signed on its behalf by the undersigned hereunto duly authorized. &#160; November&#160;29, 2023 &#160; &#160; BERKSHIRE HATHAWAY INC. &#160; &#160; /s/ Marc D.
